content:
Rory Lucyshyn-Wright is announcing a new seminar:

Dear Categorists,

I am writing you to announce a series of online talks in category theory:

The Online Category Theory Seminar at Brandon University
(BU CatS)

Preliminary Schedule:

(Talks will be at 8 pm UTC/GMT.)

Speaker: Walter Tholen (York University)
Title: Colimits
Date: Tuesday, February 23 (2021)

Speaker: Robin Cockett (University of Calgary)
Title: Latent factorization systems:
factorization systems on partial map categories
Date: Thursday, March 11 (2021)

Speaker: Ben MacAdam (University of Calgary)
Title: Segal conditions for Lie algebroids
Date: Tuesday, March 16 (2021)

Speaker: Julia Ramos Gonz√°lez (University of Antwerp)
Title: (To be announced)
Date: Tuesday, March 30 (2021)

Speaker: Geoff Cruttwell (Mount Allison University)
Title: Latent fibrations:
Fibrations for categories of partial maps
Dates:
Tuesday, April 13, 2021 (Part I)
Tuesday, April 20, 2021 (Part II)

Speaker: Dorette Pronk (Dalhousie University)
Title: (To be announced)
Date: Tuesday, April 27 (2021)

To subscribe for detailed announcements and abstracts, and for a link to the online talks, please contact one of the organizers:

Darien DeWolf (dewolfd@brandonu.ca)
Rory Lucyshyn-Wright (lucyshyn-wrightr@brandonu.ca)
Jason Parker (parkerj@brandonu.ca)

Best regards,
Rory Lucyshyn-Wright (on behalf of the organizers)
